title: A request regarding URF
body:
Hello good men and women of the boards,
I am a representative of the recent and upcoming highschool graduates, who are soon approaching exam.
These exams are a stressful time, and the ATAR we get from it literally define our lives.
I, along with many of my friends, were thoroughly pleased to hear about the oncoming of URF.
URF is a time.
URF takes place from ~28th October to 8th November iirc (if I remember correctly).
While the exams for school start at roughly the same date, and end much later.
I IMPLORE (a word I learned recently) the Riot team to please have an additional 'URF weekend' or something sometime after exams have ended, because I have waited so long for this and would be devastated to miss out on it, as I feel many other people undertaking exams would feel.
Thank you very much for your time and please take this into consideration!!!

replies.body:
So this is a concern that has been brought up by others on the boards already, and I definitely agree that it would be awesome for Riot to have some kind of consideration for this. With that said, I honestly doubt anything will come of it, there are a variety of reasons why it would be impractical or problematic for Riot and the game, which I went into a bit of detail about in the other thread (which you can find here https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/tW614lhe-normal-urf-times-and-exam-conflicts ).

I'd highly recommend that anyone you know who is in the same situation pop onto the boards and share their thoughts and concerns about this. It may not change anything, but there's no harm in trying.
Focus on your studies, not the game.

> Focus on your studies, not the game.

Real late reply, but that is kind of the point.
I have no idea why they're doing it so close to season end.
It's because URF is being brought back as part of the 10th anniversary celebrations, and those dates are what fits with the original release date for LoL.
